>     Regards your 'HEAD -e' experience, seems like this site serves
>     differently dependent on user-agent volunteered. Here is wget with
>     default user-agent:
>
>     stack@debord:~/workspace/heritrix/jobs/default-20061127170142701$
>     wget
>     --verbose http://www.gnnetcom.es/es/es <http://www.gnnetcom.es/es/es>
>     --09:21:14-- http://www.gnnetcom.es/es/es
>     <http://www.gnnetcom.es/es/es>
>     => `es.1'
>     Resolving www.gnnetcom.es... 12.105.84.103 <http://12.105.84.103>
>     Connecting to www.gnnetcom.es|12.105.84.103|:80... connected.
>     HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 302 Found
>     Location: /website/Templates/ClientMessage [following]

>     <http://www.gnnetcom.es:80>.
>     HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 404 Not Found
>     09:21:15 ERROR 404: Not Found.
>
>     If I use same user-agent as I'm using in Heritrix, I get different
>     response:
>
>     stack@debord:~/workspace/heritrix/jobs/default-20061127170142701$
>     wget
>     --verbose --user-agent="Mozilla/5.0 (compatible)"
>     http://www.gnnetcom.es/es/es <http://www.gnnetcom.es/es/es>

>     Length: 40,834 (40K) [text/html]
>
>     100%[==================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================>]
>
>     40,834 75.10K/s
>
>     09:20:30 (74.93 KB/s) - `es' saved [40834/40834]
>
>     Yours,
>     St.Ack

>     >
